sessionCookie.title: Instagram Session Cookie (sessionid)
sessionCookie.description: Your Instagram session cookie (sessionid). Get it from browser DevTools > Application > Cookies > instagram.com > sessionid

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Select your account age/activity level to auto-set safe daily follow limits

maxFollowsPerRun.title: Max Follows Per Run
maxFollowsPerRun.description: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Never exceed 50 follows in one run. Recommended: 5-10 (brand new), 10-15 (new), 15-25 (mature), 25-50 (aged)

delayBetweenFollows.title: Delay Between Follows (seconds)
delayBetweenFollows.description: ⚠️ Minimum 30s recommended (brand new accounts: 60-90s). Time to wait between follows to avoid detection

randomDelayVariation.title: Random Delay Variation (±seconds)
randomDelayVariation.description: Random variation to make activity look human. Recommended: 15-30 seconds

useCleanedInput.title: Use Cleaned Input from Previous Run
useCleanedInput.description: If enabled, automatically uses the cleaned input from the previous run (removes already followed accounts)

scrapFromProfile.title: Scrape Followers from Profile (Optional)
scrapFromProfile.description: Instagram username or full profile URL to scrape followers from (e.g., 'instagram' or 'https://www.instagram.com/instagram/'). Leave empty to skip.

scrapFromPost.title: Scrape Likers from Post (Optional)
scrapFromPost.description: Instagram post URL to scrape likers from (e.g., 'https://www.instagram.com/p/ABC123/'). Leave empty to skip.

maxScrapesToFollow.title: Max Accounts to Scrape
maxScrapesToFollow.description: Maximum number of followers/likers to scrape and auto-follow (from profiles/posts)

usersToFollow.title: Users to Follow (Manual List)
usersToFollow.description: List of Instagram usernames to follow manually. Add as many as you want; the actor will process them in batches based on Max Follows Per Run setting.
